r.s: PEAR::HTML_Page is a base class for XHTML page generation.
r.d: The PEAR::HTML_Page package provides a simple interface for generating an XHTML compliant page. * supports virtually all HTML doctypes, from HTML 2.0 through XHTML 1.1 and XHTML Basic 1.0 plus preliminary support for XHTML 2.0 * namespace support * global language declaration for the document * line ending styles * full META tag support * support for stylesheet declaration in the head section * support for linked stylesheets and scripts * body can be a string, object with toHtml or toString methods or an array (can be combined)
